introduction: SYNOPSISYu-mi is frustrated with her husband's impotency. Her friend Young-eun first introduced Young-mi to Seung-pyo. Since Young-eun knew that she was terminally ill, she let Yu-mi have Seung-pyo. Seung-pyo has an inferiority complex due to his sexual shortcomings. He overcompensates for this with his ambition but he needs Managing Director Kim's help to succeed. Kim is drawn to Yu-mi as Seung-pyo maneuvers it so that Yu-mi and the managing director spend as much time as possible together while satisfying his thirst for success. Seung-pyo gets a post abroad just like he wanted. Seeing her husband off, Yu-mi turns around when Kim's car follows her from behind.故事好由美会见由seungpyo金的丈夫，管理传入和醉酒老板。由美不高兴，因为她的丈夫是完全的性摧残。由美dwaetneunde结婚的朋友介绍一下精神是妥协的精神，以seungpyo由美是因为他sihanbu生活。Seungpyo是必要的，以帮助金，管理捂性缺陷，自卑使他成功。之间的两个到三倍，以满足金，董事总经理gatneunde上由美暗恋seungpyo不要错过注意到，金董事总经理。Seungpyo而凯恩，并获得尤米·基姆，董事总经理，作为可以被满足计划去自己的职业生涯的动机。董事总经理金也报道穿透转移到省公司的seungpyo的意图和花费接近由美。Seungpyo转移请假海外分支机构转移，并把他背在身后的计划之后，尤米·基姆，管理汽车的董事。
